channel.title: Pures
channel.description:
*Most* pures are retarted tbh. Let's take a look between a main and a pure:
Pures stats: 60 att 70 str 1 def 43 pray 70 range 70 mage 69 hp
64 combat
Mains Stats: 54 att 63 str 50 def 40 pray 40 range 45 mage 54 hp
64 combat
Now this is how the fight goes: The main hits accurately, but not high. The pure hits high on some hits but not at all accurate.
Pure: 0mg def n00b!!!!1111 Main: No, I trained for it. Pure: Omg lmao ur sad!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Main: Then why don't u train def if you want to pk effectively? Pure: Omg def 4 n00bs lel stfu n GTFO!!!!!!!!!!!!
Pure starts running.
This is what happens every damn time I try to fight a pure with my main.
Discuss.
EDIT: Pures I can actually respect:
Yankin deez I mahatma I kids ranqe Most old school pkers ^^

item.title: Pures
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

took about 2 months botting (sensible) could probably do it in a month of suicide botting

Read full topic

item.title: Pures
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:13, topic:300797”]you say this, i am a pure on f2p with 40 att maxed str / range, i get attacked alot without asking, i say “no arm or nty” and alot of the time the rune pkers say “nty, no running nerd”.

so infact you are being quite short-sighted when you say the pures are the only ones who are being childish, when it may actually be you.[/quote]
Haha. The funniest ones are the guys that are like “Fight no safe”, and then get their arses handed to them and eat like pigs at a trough.
Better still is when a ranger in tank gear attacks me while I’m in robes and I still manage to fuck em up.

How long did the account take to bot?

Read full topic

item.title: Pures
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

you say this, i am a pure on f2p with 40 att maxed str / range, i get attacked alot without asking, i say “no arm or nty” and alot of the time the rune pkers say “nty, no running nerd”.

so infact you are being quite short-sighted when you say the pures are the only ones who are being childish, when it may actually be you.

Read full topic

item.title: Pures
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I’m not disputing their arrogance. I don’t have much to do with many pures (although there are a couple that I can really appreciate speaking to).

I happen to know a completely f2p pure (no p2p at any stage) with over 100m experience; great guy, a pleasure to talk to. It’s just that a lot of the younger players seem to have this disposition towards being arrogant; the older ones are usually fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Pures
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“haticks, post:5, topic:300797”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=397078.msg2948913#msg2948913 date=1252365530]
If you’re on f2p running around in rune armour attacking players in monks robes then that’s considered pretty bad etiquette.
[/quote]Those who rune around in monk robes calling those of us with rune on def nubs deserve it. Pures piss me off. The majority of them are arrogant and cocky, which makes it impossible too have a conversation with one, or even train in the same area as one.[/quote]

That’s mostly accurate.

[size=2pt]Inb4 Lothy rage.[/size]

Read full topic
